steps.title: The ğŸ™‡ emoji was added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.
steps.content: The ğŸ™‡ emoji was added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. It was officially approved as part of Unicode 6.0 on October 11, 2010. [9] X Research source The ğŸ™‡â€â™€ï¸ (woman bowing) and ğŸ™‡â€â™‚ï¸ (man bowing) emojis were added to Emoji 4.0 on November 28, 2016, along with new gendered emojis and emoji skin tones. steps.content: The ğŸ™‡ emojiâ€™s Unicode is U+1F647.
